name: Japanese alphabet (Hiragana)
description: Hiragana & Katakana application helps you to master basic Japanese characters Hiragana and Katakana in the very awesome way.   Features:  * Full Hiragana and Katakana characters: basic, dakuten and combo * Native speaker sounds (offline available) * Variety exercise types to help you master these characters * Simple, clear but beautiful graphics design * Learn directly from the main screen with Ninja icon  An application which must have for every Japanese learner.
